snippet: Gorden Eden, the state public safety secretary, was named Friday to lead the troubled Albuquerque Police Department as it works to emerge from a federal inquiry into allegations of excessive force and dozens of police shootings.
abstract: Gorden Eden, New Mexico's public safety secretary, is named to lead the troubled Albuquerque Police Department as it works to emerge from a federal inquiry into allegations of excessive force and dozens of police shootings.
lead_paragraph: Gorden Eden, the state public safety secretary, was named Friday to lead the troubled Albuquerque Police Department as it works to emerge from a federal inquiry into allegations of excessive force and dozens of police shootings.

headline.main: New Mexico: Police Chief Chosen for Embattled Albuquerque Force
headline.print_headline: New Mexico: Police Chief Chosen for Embattled Albuquerque Force
